title: Thanks Riot i finally can connect to the game!
body: Thanks Riot i finally can connect to the game after like 10 days or so, too bad I lost a week worth of missions :(...

replies.body: Heeeeey I'm glad you're able to get back on the Rift now! It sucks to know that the event has ended now and there aren't currently any missions, but rest assured they'll be back at a later date!
